item.title: Broccoli, Cauliflower, Carrots
item.description: Broccoli, Cauliflower, Carrots for Zero Minutes Came out tender, but not mushy. 1 cup of water and set it to zero minutes. Zero minutes does sound a little low, but it works :) Quick released 1 minute after the alarm sounds to let me know that zero minutes was reached. * Photo
